prompts: Create a majestic water-type Pokemon that resembles a giant whale with sleek features.
Imagine a legendary aquatic creature that dominates the seas with its powerful presence.
Generate a blue Pokemon with a streamlined body and distinct patterns for a unique design.
Show me a mythical water Pokemon that has the ability to control ocean currents.
Design a Pokemon that can thrive in both deep oceans and shallow waters with vibrant colors.
Give me a stylized version of a powerful water-type Pokemon with intimidating eyes and fins.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the beauty of the ocean, featuring shades of blue and white.
